name: Inspired By Love
description:
https://github.com/Dlearn/InspiredByLove.git

Made By: Le Nguyen, Dylan Ho Xian Zheng, Stanley Arvan Wijaya, Yim Chia Hui

INSTRUCTIONS:

THIS IS A TWO PLAYER GAME.

MOUSE TO CONTROL MOVEMENT OF YELLOW AVATAR, WASD TO CONTROL MOVEMENT OF SHIELD.

SHIELD CAN BLOCK PROJECTILES, IF A PROJECTILE HITS YELLOW GAME OVER.

SURVIVE AS LONG AS YOU CAN AND EARN POINTS FOR THE TIME YOU ARE ALIVE.

THEME:CLOSE ENOUGH

THE TWO CHARACTERS ARE TETHERED TOGETHER, MEANING THAT THEY CANNOT BE ENTIRELY SEPARATED.

THEY MUST STAY CLOSE ENOUGH TOGETHER AND WORK TOGETHER TO SURVIVE AS LONG AS POSSIBLE.

ALTHOUGH SHIELD CAN BLOCK ALL TYPES OF PROJECTILES, HE IS ONLY AS GOOD AS YELLOW.

WORKING IN TANDEM IS WHERE THEY BOTH ARE ABLE TO SURVIVE THE LONGEST IN THIS ENDLESS GAME.
